de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.zip

Class ZipService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.zip.ZipService

  • @Service
public class ZipService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for backend tasks related to storing ZIP-archives uploaded through ZipController.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • saveUploadedFile

        protected java.nio.file.Path saveUploadedFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile uploadedFile)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Store an uploaded ZIP-archive to disk.
        Parameters:
        uploadedFile - File The file which was uploaded which you want to store on disk.
        Returns:
        Path The path to the saved file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs writing to or creating the file.

      • submitGenerationTask

        protected java.lang.String submitGenerationTask(java.lang.String zipGenerationProperties)
        Submit a task for the generation of a server pack from a ZIP-archive.
        Parameters:
        zipGenerationProperties - String containing all information required to generate a server pack from a ZIP-archive. See ZipController.requestGenerationFromZip(String, String, String, String, String, boolean).
        Returns:
        Boolean Returns true if the task was submitted.
